reviewText: this dvd, in my opinion, seems to be an update on hal lindsay's "the late great planet earth," in that most of the topics touched in this dvds had been discussed in the aforesaid vhs of lindsay released during the 80s, i believe. therefore, anyone unfamiliar to lindsay's "the late great planet earth" will not, in my opinion, fully appreciate this dvd. totally appreciation of this dvd's contents, needless to say, is dependent on seeing lindsay's material.
